stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Phishing Email with Photos Theme Associated with Darkhotel Activity
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 22 January 2015, an aviation industry organization received a phishing email from james.wright24@mail.com. The email included the subject "photos from our last meeting" and a malicious link to photo.storyonboard.net (204.14.121.60). This phishing campaign was associated with Darkhotel activity.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
---- BEGIN EMAIL HEADER ---- Return-Path: <james.wright24@mail.com> Received: from REDACTED Wed, 21 Jan 2015 21:37:17 -0800 X-Sieve: CMU Sieve 2.3 Received: from [REDACTED] by [REDACTED] (version=TLSv1/SSLv3 cipher=DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA bits=256 verify=FAIL) for [REDACTED]; Wed, 21 Jan 2015 21:37:17 -0800 Received: from localhost (localhost [127.0.0.1]) by [REDACTED] with SMTP id t0M5bGYj011782; Wed, 21 Jan 2015 21:37:16 -0800 Received: from mout.gmx.com (mout.gmx.com [74.208.4.200]) by [REDACTED] (version=TLSv1/SSLv3 cipher=DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA bits=256 verify=NO) for [REDACTED]; Wed, 21 Jan 2015 21:36:58 -0800 Received: from [140.113.110.11] by 3capp-mailcom-lxa10.server.lan (via HTTP); Thu, 22 Jan 2015 06:36:56 +0100 MIME-Version: 1.0 Message-ID: <trinity-8e9527b7-597c-499d-b390-629b9e92b368-1421905015659@3capp-mailcom-lxa10> From: [REDACTED] <james.wright24@mail.com> To: REDACTED Subject: photos from our last meeting Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Date: Thu, 22 Jan 2015 06:36:56 +0100 Importance: normal Sensitivity: Normal X-Priority: 3 X-Provags-ID: V03:K0: X-UI-Out-Filterresults: notjunk:1; X-TM-AS-MML: disable X-TM-AS-ERS: 74.208.4.200-127.9.0.1 X-TM-AS-Product-Ver: IMSS-7.1.0.1597-7.5.0.1017-21272.003 X-TM-AS-Result: No--3.766-4.5-31-10 X-imss-scan-details: No--3.766-4.5-31-10;No--3.766-5.0-31-10;No--3.766-10.0-31-10 X-TM-AS-Result-Xfilter: Match text exemption rules:No;Match text exemption rules:No X-TMASE-MatchedRID:  X-imss-reprocess-rules: 282.121 X-imss-reprocess-type: readdress X-TM-AS-URLRatingInfo: 71-93-=?utf-8?B?aHR0cDovL3Bob3RvLnN0b3J5b25ib2FyZC5uZXQvcGhvdG92aWV3ZXIuaHRh?= X-TM-AS-URLRatingAct: 80-handoff:xheader X-CustomCatchHeader: noloop ---- END EMAIL HEADER ----
---- BEGIN EMAIL BODY ---- I send your photos from last meeting. I know we took pictures several months ago, but I'm deeply sorry that I'm now sending photos. Please check your photos, and if you have any queries, give me a reply.
You can download photos on the link below. Download photos <http://photo.storyonboard.net/photoviewer.hta>
Thank you. http://photo.storyonboard.net/readme.php?id=b10&type=0 ---- END EMAIL BODY ----
This link was embedded into the original email.
This file was reported as an unknown file type. This is the file that was downloaded from the reported URL (http://photo.storyonboard.net/photoviewer.hta).

The following GET request was observed:
GET /readme.php?type=creation&result=created&info=0 HTTP/1.1 Accept: */* Accept-Language: en-us Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate User-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 5.1; Trident/4.0; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.0.04506.648; .NET CLR 3.5.21022) Host: photo.storyonboard.net Connection: Keep-Alive
The domain photo.storyboard.net resolved to IP 204.14.121.60. On 26 September 2014, a third party associated IP 204.14.121.60 with campaigns using the Tapaoux malware.
